Our Splash Sloe roller blind in an attractive purple colour is a perfect choice to help you transform your space.

products.title: Splash Smokey Purple Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Smokey Purple Roller Blind in Purple. Made to measure from £9.35 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, the fabric offers wonderful light filtering properties in addition to this is also moisture resistant. This range of fabrics are the perfect choice for kitchens, bathrooms & en-suites. This dark Smokey Purple roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This rich smokey purple fabric will look stunning paired with dark wooden tones, alternatively you could add a touch of opulence to the finish by pairing with luxurious emerald greens. Our rollers are great for privacy and light control.At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This purple roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Splash Smokey Purple 89mm Vertical Blind

products.productdescription:
Our Splash Smokey Purple vertical blinds are contemporary and stylish.  A moisture-resistant dark purple fabric with a beautiful dark purplehue, makes this blind a great addition to a kitchen or bathroom.  With a variety of control and stacking options available on our headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window. At Swift Direct Blinds, with fifty years of blind making experiance, quality comes first.  This bespoke vertical blind comes with a 5 year guarantee, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Sloe Purple 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Sloe Purple 89mm Vertical Blind in Purple. Made to measure from £9.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A family favourite, our Splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds.  Splash Sloe Purple is a chic soft purple vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home.  This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this purple vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant!  Our quality made to measure vertical blinds are a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting TV drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), our vertical blinds are great for privacy and light control.Coming with sleek white components and quality-checked by our blind experts, quality is paramount.  At Swift Direct Blinds with over 50 years making and selling blinds under our belt, not only is this vertical blind made by the experts,  it also comes with a fabulous five year guarantee - extra assurance that you are investing in quality that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Smokey Purple Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Smokey Purple Panel Blind in Purple. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash Smokey Purple panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space.  The rich purple panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. 
 
As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,.5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make.  A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design. 
 
Panel blinds add a really modern feel to any space and at Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.  
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0235 Fabric Colour: Smokey Purple Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.metadescription: Splash Sloe Purple Panel Blind in Purple. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash Sloe Purple Panel blinds is a quick and stylish way to fill a space.  This purple dimout fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space.  Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe.  As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with our 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Sloe Purple Electric Roller Blind in Purple. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Sloe is an extremely attractive dusty purple colour, stylish and timeless.  Perfect for injecting colour into any room.  Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe.  This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with our Smart Hub (sold seperately).  Splash Sloe fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms.  As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

 This Splash Smokey Purple electric roller blind will brighten any room. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space.
